mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM wj_device_info WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wj_device_info( user_id, device_type, device_system_version, operator, network_type, longitude_latitude, type ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceSystemVersion}, #{operator}, #{networkType}, #{longitudeLatitude}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wj_device_info SET device_type=#{deviceType}, device_system_version=#{deviceSystemVersion}, operator=#{operator}, network_type=#{networkType}, longitude_latitude=#{longitudeLatitude}, type=#{type} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
